body:
Ever since the original move to GitHub Actions almost 4 years ago its been `windows-2019` that's been in use.

I'm thinking we should always use `-latest` when possible

[![Coverage Status](https://coveralls.io/builds/69044796/badge)](https://coveralls.io/builds/69044796)

coverage: 94.497%. remained the same
when pulling **85331de80f726cacd73dd48556ef0153692db1a4 on voxpelli/update-actions-to-windows-latest**
into **c44653a3a04b8418ec24a942fa7513a4673f3667 on main**.
